mapper.insert: insert into share values( null, #{goodID}, #{userID}, #{content}, 0, 0, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
mapper.update: update share set goodID=#{goodID}, userID=#{userID}, content=#{content}, supportNum=#{supportNum}, commentNum=#{commentNum} where ID=#{ID};
mapper.select: select share.*, goods.pic as goodImage, goods.title as goodTitle, users.userImg as userImage, users.userName as userName, goods.url as goodUrl, goods.priceCurrent as goodPriceCurrent, goods.priceOld as goodPriceOld, goods.from as goodFrom from share,goods,users WHERE share.goodID=goods.ID and share.userID=users.ID limit #{startRow},#{pageSize};
